findings.message: The claim that `imagesRaw` has no consumers outside app `RoomCard.tsx` and `RoomStructuredData.tsx` is incomplete. There is an additional consumer at `apps/brikette/src/utils/schema/builders.ts` (`room.imagesRaw.slice(0, 4)`).
The 'Direct' impact list omits `apps/brikette/src/utils/schema/builders.ts`, which will break when `imagesRaw` is removed unless updated in the same PR.
Apartment scope ambiguity: 'out of scope' should be clarified as 'out of scope for content population, in scope for type migration'.

note: Score 8/10 = lp_score 4.0 â€” credible threshold met. All Major findings addressed in autofix before final persist.
